pages.text: Bricks are the unique minecraft blocks made from a brick oven. In this section we will show you the unrealistic way of making a variety of bricks.

pages.title: New Brick Blocks!
pages.text: Save your cobblestone and bonemeal, and dyes, you can make some unique bricks.
Brick Ovens are very simplistic to make and operate much like a furnace. Here's the crafting recipe:

pages.title: Brick Oven Recipe
pages.string: Use all that left over cobblestone and coal from digging to make a unique brick.

pages.text: How brick ovens work is very simple and easy to follow. $(br)The bottom slot is for fuel and there are three slots at the top. $(li)The left slot will take a dye or cobblestone. $(li)The middle slot will take cobblestone or bonemeal.$(li)The right slot will always take cobblestone.

pages.title: Standard Bricks
pages.text: Here is a standard lavender brick made with purple dye.

The bricks will either be standard or smeared. Standard bricks can be made into stairs, slabs, walls, plates, or buttons using standard recipes in a crafting table. Smeared bricks are meant to only offset standard blocks when making a wall, so they can only be blocks.$(br2)Dyeing sheep and placing their wool in a crafting table will now return a dye based on the color of wool.

pages.title: Smeared Bricks
pages.text: Here is a smeared lavender brick made with purple dye.
